effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes
its power. This may also lower the target’s 
Sp. Def stat.
